      • throwDices

        public void throwDices(java.util.List<Dice> init)
        Populates the reserve with the dices
        Parameters:
        init - is the list of dices to put in the reserve, a random value between 1 and 6 is assigned to each dice

      • chooseDice

        public Dice chooseDice(int index)
        Takes a dice from the reserve
        Parameters:
        index - is the index of the dice the player wants to pick
        Returns:
        returns the dice chosen by the player
